categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text: The Stygeon system was a star system located in the Nuiri sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. The system held at least one habitable planet, Stygeon Prime, which was orbited by at least two moons. During the Clone Wars, the Confederacy of Independent Systems operated a prison known as the Spire on Stygeon Prime. The prison was later operated by the Galactic Empire.
